EmailTemplate.description: Email to send on failure of Billable service work order
EmailTemplate.name: Work Order Send Failure Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Failure of Billable Service Work Order
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Customer Care Team,
During ZDST order ({!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name}) posting, the work order failed to create in SFDC. Please evaluate order and determine if a manual work order should be created.
Thanks, The System
